seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff/principal qualifiers, and minimum of 3 years of experience is mentioned.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' and core responsibilities focus on reporting, visualization, and BI tools like Cognos.

sub_specialty.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools (IBM InfoSphere DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) are explicitly mentioned as required expertise.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities focus on individual tasks like development, testing, and troubleshooting without explicit leadership or management duties.

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms (AWS, Google, Azure) are mentioned as preferred experience, but no single cloud is emphasized as primary.

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google (inferred as GCP), and Azure are listed as preferred cloud platforms.

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools and BI/DW projects are mentioned, which are typically batch-oriented, with no explicit streaming/realtime tools or paradigms.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW projects and reporting/visualization focus suggest a data warehouse storage layer, though no specific tools are mentioned beyond Cognos and ETL.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India', implying a regional restriction.

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details are mentioned.

relocation_required.evidence: Location is specified as Pune, and no relocation package or requirement is mentioned.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned, and the role is based in India where H1B is not applicable.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No signals related to OPT/CPT or student visa support are mentioned.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements are discussed in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position is stated, and benefits are typically associated with W2 employment in India (though not explicitly mentioned).

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'continuous improvement' and 'growth opportunities' but lacks specific career tracks or promotion ladders.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with 'business and technical members of the team', which may include senior staff, but no formal mentorship program is stated.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or role changes.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are explicitly or implicitly mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Most skills are listed as 'required' (Cognos, UNIX, ETL tools) with minimal 'nice-to-have' mentions.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on BI/DW projects and reporting/visualization using Cognos, with well-defined responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align with mid-level seniority (3+ years of experience, Cognos, ETL tools).
